--- config: logLevel: 'debug' theme: 'forest' --- %% Ref.: https://mermaid.js.org/syntax/timeline.html timeline title Advent of Code 2025 - Puzzle Days (in December) 1
Secret Entrance: Modular arithmetic 2
Gift Shop: Repeating number / string sub-sequences 3
Lobby: Max digits in number 4
Printing Departments: 2D grid symbol matching & neighbour counting 5
Cafeteria: Positive integer number ranges / intervals 6
Trash Compactor: Column based parsing of data input 7
Laboratories: Paths through 2D grid 8
Playground: Ordering (by Euclidian distance) & grouping 3D point pairs. 9
Movie Theater: 2D points, rectangles sizes & ray-casting 10
Factory: Minimal solutions to sets of linear equations 11
Reactor: Graph paths + caching 12
Christmas Tree Farm: Shape fitting in 2D grids %% Version 2025-12-17a
